What does FAS/FASD mean?
Most women are aware of 
Fetal Alcohol Syndrome 
(FAS). Children born with FAS 
can have growth problems, 
facial defects, and lifelong 
learning and behaviour 
problems. Fetal Alcohol 
Spectrum	Disorder	(FASD) 
describes the range of less 
obvious	effects	(‘sleeping	
symptoms’) that can be 
mild to severe. The majority 
of children with FASD may 
experience	difficulties	in	many
